en.command-cooldown: <@{}> this command is on a {:.2f}s cooldown.
en.rank-command-incorrect-format: <@{}> command must be formatted like ``{}rank steamid``
en.incorrect-steam-id:
<@{}> that SteamID is invalid!
I only accept ``steamid64, steamid & steam3.``

hu.command-cooldown: <@{}> this command is on a {:.2f}s cooldown.
hu.incorrect-steam-id:
<@{}> Érvénytelen SteamID!
Csak ezeket fogadom el: ``steamid64, steamid & steam3.``
